title: 6: S2E06 – "Something Southern This Way Comes” – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales by authors Tonia Brown, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, ranging from Lovecraftian horror from a bygone era, to tales about the unexpectedly undead, what’s waiting beneath the waves, and unexplainable sounds from underground. See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: http://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s2e06
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
